phases-discord-rich-presence.midnightcon: Phase's Discord Rich Presence Config
Basic Settings
Enable Presence
Toggles the Discord Rich Presence
Show held item in Presence
Toggles the item you're holding from showing in the Presence
Show Dimension in Presence
Toggles the dimension you're located in from showing in the Presence
Show server IP in multiplayer
Toggles server IP from showing in the Presence when playing multiplayer
Custom Dimension Rich Presence
Toggles basic support for modded dimensions
Show if Game is Paused in Presence
Toggles showing if your game is paused in the Presence
Advanced Settings (DO NOT USE UNLESS YOU KNOW WHAT YOU'RE DOING)
Enable Advanced Mode

Toggles advanced mode, allowing more customization and control over the Discord Rich Presence. 
 (This overrides all basic settings)
Typing any of the following in the fields below will replace the default text with the following:
{item_name} - Name of the Item you're currently holding
{server_ip} - Server IP you're currently playing on
{dimension_name} - Name/ID of the dimension you're currently in
Presence Details
Presence Details when holding an item
Presence State when you're playing multiplayer
Presence State when you're playing multiplayer and you're paused
Presence State when you're playing singleplayer
Presence State when you're playing singleplayer and you're paused
Changes the text from the small image in the Presence when you're in the Overworld
Changes the text from the small image in the Presence when you're in the Nether
Changes the text from the small image in the Presence when you're in the End
Changes the text from the small image in the Presence when you're in a custom dimension
Other Options
Enable Debug Mode
Toggles debug mode, which will print information to the console (Probably leave this turned off lol)
